name: Herding Cats (RedEyeManiac)
description:
It's inspection time! The land lady has come for a routine inspection and doesn't know about the cats, it is your job to hide your cats so you don't get kicked out!

This game was made in about 48 hours as part of Global Game Jam 2019.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Press SPACE to shoo away nearby cats

DON'T LET THE LANDLADY SEE A CAT!

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/herding-cats
